page.title: 02TRANSPORT
page.content: The dual carriageway,{A45(T),}from Coventry via{ Toll Bar End}going towards London runs North West to South East. The main Coventry to Banbury road,{A423(T),}runs in a more southerly direction, beyond{Ryton {Bridge}and leaves the area after crossing the {A455 }at Ryton island. The Rugby to Leamington road,{A455, crosses the Banbury and London roads going from North East to South West and meets the{B4029}about 1Km SE of Ryton on Dunsmore. There are minor roads joining Toll Bar End with{Brandon}(NE) and{Baginton (W). An access road connects the {Siskin Drive Industrial Estate}with the A45(T). There are no railways, nor waterways, in the area. A small portion of{Coventry Airport}falls within the area.
